019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.vmviewer;
020
021import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonGetter;
022import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonProperty;
023import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException;
024import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
025import com.fasterxml.jackson.datatype.jsr310.JavaTimeModule;
026import freemarker.core.ParseException;
027import freemarker.template.MalformedTemplateNameException;
028import freemarker.template.Template;
029import freemarker.template.TemplateNotFoundException;
030import io.kubernetes.client.util.Strings;
031import java.io.IOException;
032import java.util.Collections;
033import java.util.HashSet;
034import java.util.Optional;
035import java.util.ResourceBundle;
036import java.util.Set;
037import java.util.logging.Level;
038
039import org.jdrupes.json.JsonBeanDecoder;
040import org.jdrupes.json.JsonDecodeException;
041import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.K8sDynamicModel;
042import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.K8sObserver;
043import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.ChannelCache;
044import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.ModifyVm;
045import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.VmChannel;
046import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.VmDefChanged;
047import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
048import org.jgrapes.core.Event;
049import org.jgrapes.core.Manager;
050import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
051import org.jgrapes.http.Session;
052import org.jgrapes.util.events.KeyValueStoreQuery;
053import org.jgrapes.util.events.KeyValueStoreUpdate;
054import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.Conlet.RenderMode;
055import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.ConletBaseModel;
056import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.ConsoleConnection;
057import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.ConsoleUser;
058import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.WebConsoleUtils;
059import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddConletType;
060import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddPageResources.ScriptResource;
061import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.ConletDeleted;
062import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.ConsoleReady;
063import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.DeleteConlet;
064import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.NotifyConletModel;
065import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.NotifyConletView;
066import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.OpenModalDialog;
067import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.RenderConlet;
068import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.RenderConletRequestBase;
069import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.SetLocale;
070import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.freemarker.FreeMarkerConlet;
071
072/**
073 * The Class VmConlet.
074 */
075@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
076public class VmViewer extends FreeMarkerConlet<VmViewer.ViewerModel> {
077
078    private static final Set<RenderMode> MODES = RenderMode.asSet(
079        RenderMode.Preview, RenderMode.Edit);
080    private final ChannelCache<String, VmChannel,
081            K8sDynamicModel> channelManager = new ChannelCache<>();
082    private static ObjectMapper objectMapper
083        = new ObjectMapper().registerModule(new JavaTimeModule());
084
085    /**
086     * The periodically generated update event.
087     */
088    public static class Update extends Event<Void> {
089    }
090
091    /**
092     * Creates a new component with its channel set to the given channel.
093     * 
094     * @param componentChannel the channel that the component's handlers listen
095     * on by default and that {@link Manager#fire(Event, Channel...)}
096     * sends the event to
097     */
098    public VmViewer(Channel componentChannel) {
099        super(componentChannel);
100    }
101
102    /**
103     * On {@link ConsoleReady}, fire the {@link AddConletType}.
104     *
105     * @param event the event
106     * @param channel the channel
107     * @throws TemplateNotFoundException the template not found exception
108     * @throws MalformedTemplateNameException the malformed template name
109     *             exception
110     * @throws ParseException the parse exception
111     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
112     */
113    @Handler
114    public void onConsoleReady(ConsoleReady event, ConsoleConnection channel)
115            throws TemplateNotFoundException, MalformedTemplateNameException,
116            ParseException, IOException {
117        // Add conlet resources to page
118        channel.respond(new AddConletType(type())
119            .setDisplayNames(
120                localizations(channel.supportedLocales(), "conletName"))
121            .addRenderMode(RenderMode.Preview)
122            .addScript(new ScriptResource().setScriptType("module")
123                .setScriptUri(event.renderSupport().conletResource(
124                    type(), "VmViewer-functions.js"))));
125    }
126
127    private String storagePath(Session session, String conletId) {
128        return "/" + WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(session)
129            .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse("")
130            + "/" + VmViewer.class.getName() + "/" + conletId;
131    }
132
133    @Override
134    protected Optional<ViewerModel> createStateRepresentation(Event<?> event,
135            ConsoleConnection connection, String conletId) throws Exception {
136        var model = new ViewerModel(conletId);
137        String jsonState = objectMapper.writeValueAsString(model);
138        connection.respond(new KeyValueStoreUpdate().update(
139            storagePath(connection.session(), model.getConletId()), jsonState));
140        return Optional.of(model);
141    }
142
143    @Override
144    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.EmptyCatchBlock")
145    protected Optional<ViewerModel> recreateState(Event<?> event,
146            ConsoleConnection channel, String conletId) throws Exception {
147        KeyValueStoreQuery query = new KeyValueStoreQuery(
148            storagePath(channel.session(), conletId), channel);
149        newEventPipeline().fire(query, channel);
150        try {
151            if (!query.results().isEmpty()) {
152                var json = query.results().get(0).values().stream().findFirst()
153                    .get();
154                ViewerModel model
155                    = objectMapper.readValue(json, ViewerModel.class);
156                return Optional.of(model);
157            }
158        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
159            // Means we have no result.
160        }
161
162        // Fall back to creating default state.
163        return createStateRepresentation(event, channel, conletId);
164    }
165
166    @Override
167    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops")
168    protected Set<RenderMode> doRenderConlet(RenderConletRequestBase<?> event,
169            ConsoleConnection channel, String conletId, ViewerModel conletState)
170            throws Exception {
171        ResourceBundle resourceBundle = resourceBundle(channel.locale());
172        Set<RenderMode> renderedAs = new HashSet<>();
173        if (event.renderAs().contains(RenderMode.Preview)) {
174            Template tpl
175                = freemarkerConfig().getTemplate("VmViewer-preview.ftl.html");
176            channel.respond(new RenderConlet(type(), conletId,
177                processTemplate(event, tpl,
178                    fmModel(event, channel, conletId, conletState)))
179                        .setRenderAs(
180                            RenderMode.Preview.addModifiers(event.renderAs()))
181                        .setSupportedModes(MODES));
182            renderedAs.add(RenderMode.Preview);
183            if (!Strings.isNullOrEmpty(conletState.vmName())) {
184                updateConfig(channel, conletState);
185            }
186        }
187        if (event.renderAs().contains(RenderMode.Edit)) {
188            Template tpl = freemarkerConfig()
189                .getTemplate("VmViewer-edit.ftl.html");
190            var fmModel = fmModel(event, channel, conletId, conletState);
191            fmModel.put("vmNames",
192                channelManager.keys().stream().sorted().toList());
193            channel.respond(new OpenModalDialog(type(), conletId,
194                processTemplate(event, tpl, fmModel))
195                    .addOption("cancelable", true)
196                    .addOption("okayLabel",
197                        resourceBundle.getString("okayLabel")));
198        }
199        return renderedAs;
200    }
201
202    private void updateConfig(ConsoleConnection channel, ViewerModel model) {
203        channel.respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
204            model.getConletId(), "updateConfig", model.vmName()));
205        updateVmDef(channel, model);
206    }
207
208    private void updateVmDef(ConsoleConnection channel, ViewerModel model) {
209        if (Strings.isNullOrEmpty(model.vmName())) {
210            return;
211        }
212        channelManager.associated(model.vmName()).ifPresent(vmDef -> {
213            try {
214                var def = JsonBeanDecoder.create(vmDef.data().toString())
215                    .readObject();
216                channel.respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
217                    model.getConletId(), "updateVmDefinition", def));
218            } catch (JsonDecodeException e) {
219                logger.log(Level.SEVERE, e,
220                    () -> "Failed to serialize VM definition");
221            }
222        });
223    }
224
225    @Override
226    protected void doConletDeleted(ConletDeleted event,
227            ConsoleConnection channel, String conletId, ViewerModel conletState)
228            throws Exception {
229        if (event.renderModes().isEmpty()) {
230            channel.respond(new KeyValueStoreUpdate().delete(
231                storagePath(channel.session(), conletId)));
232        }
233    }
234
235    /**
236     * Track the VM definitions.
237     *
238     * @param event the event
239     * @param channel the channel
240     * @throws JsonDecodeException the json decode exception
241     * @throws IOException 
242     */
243    @Handler(namedChannels = "manager")
244    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.ConfusingTernary", "PMD.CognitiveComplexity",
245        "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops", "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals",
246        "PMD.ConfusingArgumentToVarargsMethod" })
247    public void onVmDefChanged(VmDefChanged event, VmChannel channel)
248            throws JsonDecodeException, IOException {
249        var vmDef = new K8sDynamicModel(channel.client().getJSON()
250            .getGson(), event.vmDefinition().data());
251        var vmName = vmDef.getMetadata().getName();
252        if (event.type() == K8sObserver.ResponseType.DELETED) {
253            channelManager.remove(vmName);
254        } else {
255            channelManager.put(vmName, channel, vmDef);
256        }
257        for (var entry : conletIdsByConsoleConnection().entrySet()) {
258            var connection = entry.getKey();
259            for (var conletId : entry.getValue()) {
260                var model = stateFromSession(connection.session(), conletId);
261                if (model.isEmpty() || !model.get().vmName().equals(vmName)) {
262                    continue;
263                }
264                if (event.type() == K8sObserver.ResponseType.DELETED) {
265                    connection.respond(
266                        new DeleteConlet(conletId, Collections.emptySet()));
267                } else {
268                    updateVmDef(connection, model.get());
269                }
270            }
271        }
272    }
273
274    @Override
275    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidDecimalLiteralsInBigDecimalConstructor",
276        "PMD.TooFewBranchesForASwitchStatement" })
277    protected void doUpdateConletState(NotifyConletModel event,
278            ConsoleConnection channel, ViewerModel model)
279            throws Exception {
280        event.stop();
281        var vmName = event.params().asString(0);
282        var vmChannel = channelManager.channel(vmName).orElse(null);
283        if (vmChannel == null) {
284            return;
285        }
286        switch (event.method()) {
287        case "selectedVm":
288            model.setVmName(event.params().asString(0));
289            String jsonState = objectMapper.writeValueAsString(model);
290            channel.respond(new KeyValueStoreUpdate().update(storagePath(
291                channel.session(), model.getConletId()), jsonState));
292            updateConfig(channel, model);
293            break;
294        case "start":
295            fire(new ModifyVm(vmName, "state", "Running", vmChannel));
296            break;
297        case "stop":
298            fire(new ModifyVm(vmName, "state", "Stopped", vmChannel));
299            break;
300        default:// ignore
301            break;
302        }
303    }
304
305    @Override
306    protected boolean doSetLocale(SetLocale event, ConsoleConnection channel,
307            String conletId) throws Exception {
308        return true;
309    }
310
311    /**
312     * The Class VmsModel.
313     */
314    public static class ViewerModel extends ConletBaseModel {
315
316        private String vmName;
317
318        /**
319         * Instantiates a new vms model.
320         *
321         * @param conletId the conlet id
322         */
323        public ViewerModel(@JsonProperty("conletId") String conletId) {
324            super(conletId);
325        }
326
327        /**
328         * Gets the vm name.
329         *
330         * @return the vmName
331         */
332        @JsonGetter("vmName")
333        public String vmName() {
334            return vmName;
335        }
336
337        /**
338         * Sets the vm name.
339         *
340         * @param vmName the vmName to set
341         */
342        public void setVmName(String vmName) {
343            this.vmName = vmName;
344        }
345
346    }
347}
